HeroPage.heading: Free and Open-Source Next.js Template for Startup & SaaS
HeroPage.description: Startup is free Next.js template for startups and SaaS business websites comes with all the essential pages, components, and sections you need to launch a complete business website, built-with Next 13.x and Tailwind CSS.

FeaturesPage.paragraph: Discover the key features that our service offers.
FeaturesPage.feature1Paragraph: Start using our service easily with an intuitive interface.
FeaturesPage.feature2Paragraph: Support your business decisions with detailed data analysis and reporting.
FeaturesPage.feature3Paragraph: Your data is safely protected with the latest security technology.
